comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos from the funeral of the Veracruz victims show Mayor Mitchel with U. S. President Woodrow Wilson:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5517542032/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Wystan for connecting these photos of the funeral for the Veracruz victims together. Its also great that you noticed the man with the camera in the lower left of the image.   We especially like to note images of cameras and photographers in our photo descriptions, so other researchers can easily find them.  Thank you!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: May 11, 1914: National Memorial Service for the 17 U. S. sailors who were killed at Vera Cruz, Mexico. Story in the New York Times, 5/11/14: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=940CE3DB173AE6...
